adminAccessMessage: You have access to the platform's administrative tools.
competeAndWin: Compete with the best. Claim your victory.
passwordNote: Note: Password is not validated in this demo.
addMoneyDescription: Select a payment method to add funds to your wallet.
noPaymentMethods: No payment methods are configured by the admin. Please check back later.
enterAmount: Enter the amount you want to add.
processingPaymentDescription: Please wait. Do not close this window.
logoUrlDescription: If provided, this logo will replace the name in the header.
scrollingNoticeDescription: This text will scroll across the top of the site for all users. Leave empty to hide.
primaryColorDescription: Changes the main accent color (buttons, links, borders) across the app.
textPrimaryColorDescription: Color for main headings and important text.
textSecondaryColorDescription: Color for body text and descriptions.
backgroundColorDescription: Main background color of the application.
headingFontDescription: Font used for all headings (h1, h2, etc.).
bodyFontDescription: Font used for paragraphs and general text.
paymentGatewaysDescription: Configure payment gateways. Provide the necessary API credentials to enable automated deposits for users. A gateway will only be visible to users if it's enabled and all credential fields are filled.
transactionHistoryDescription: Review and approve or reject user deposit requests from this panel. Balance will be updated automatically upon approval.
noTransactionsRecorded: No transactions have been recorded yet.
name: Name
sendNotificationDescription: Use this form to send a broadcast notification to all registered users. It will appear in their notification center.
title: Title
awaitingRoomDetailsDescription: Room ID & Password will be updated by the admin before the match starts. Stay tuned!
noParticipants: No participants yet. Be the first to join!
joinNowFeeNotice: By clicking "Join Now", the entry fee will be deducted from your wallet.
noJoinedTournaments: You haven't joined any tournaments yet.
registrationSuccessLogin: Registration successful! You are now logged in.
registrationSuccessConfirmEmail: Registration successful! Please check your email to verify your account before logging in.
seeWhoTops: See who is dominating the leaderboard.
depositInstructions: Please send money to the agent number provided by the admin. Then, fill out this form with your payment details.
depositRequestSubmitted: Deposit request submitted! It is now under review.
paymentInstructions: Use the reference number during your payment. Your balance will update instantly after verification.
paymentSuccessful: Payment successful! Your balance has been updated.
